SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Demons do not flee or negotiate.

SetupTraits.Name: Legion
SetupTraits.Description: When fighting demons, at the start of combat, place 5 Natals, this faction's special mob, on the map in unoccupied space somewhere outside of range 2 of players. These don't count for the total encounter budget.

Traits.Name: Banish
Traits.Description: A character can disintegrate an adjacent defeated demon as an action, returning it to the void from which it came, and preventing it from being devoured.

Actions.Name: Devour
Actions.Description: The Demon devours and absorbs an adjacent Demon, including any defeated Demon, destroying it and gaining vigor 2. They can also use this on a Natal to grant them vigor 1, which can be done any number of times a combat.
